titles.title: TAILOR Act of 2025
Taking Account of Institutions with Low Operation Risk Act of 2025
TAILOR Act of 2025
Taking Account of Institutions with Low Operation Risk Act of 2025
TAILOR Act of 2025
To require the Federal financial institutions regulatory agencies to take risk profiles and business models of institutions into account when taking regulatory actions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 29 - 23.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 119-135.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 104.

committee.name: House Financial Services
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
